message: “Isabella Pollok, 29, aided Lawrence Ray, 61, in the decade-long scam, which unfolded in 2010 after they began residing with his daughter and some of the victims at Sarah Lawrence College, alleges an indictment.”

data.description: The defendant lived with the ex-con and his daughter and others in the girl's on-campus housing.
data.title: S.I. woman aided plot to force prostitution, labor and extort cash from college pals of ex-con’s daughter, say feds
